name: wasi-co/artisan-clean-architecture-boilerplate
description: A Composer package providing custom Laravel Artisan commands to streamline the creation of various clean architecture components in a Laravel application.

scripts.release: composer run test && npx standard-version && curl --fail-with-body --data tag=$(git describe --tags $(git rev-list --tags --max-count=1)) "https://__token__:$GITLAB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN@gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/62170448/packages/composer"
